name: Super Wizard
describtion: Super Wizard is positively charged with magical energy! He's either the smartest person in the room... or else he blows the whole room to bits.

name: Sneaky Goblin
describtion: Sneaky Goblins have a talent going unnoticed for a while after being deployed. It's usually the incredibly loud sound of resources being pilfered that gives them away.

name: Beta Minion
describtion: Attacks targets from a distance, glows in the dark, and is a maniac on the dance floor.

name: Dragon
describtion: The might of the dragons are known throughout the land. This scaly terror of the skies feels no mercy and nothing will escape the fiery splashes of his breath.

name: Super Witch
describtion: Focused magic creates focused results. Instead of summoning hordes of tiny Skeletons, Super Witch summons just one really big skeleton with very formidable bone density.

name: Super Dragon
describtion: Sometimes having a fire inside of you isn't enough. The Super Dragon has fires on the inside, outside, and if he gets to do his thing, all around him!

name: Super Giant
describtion: Super Giants are more visually similar to Boxer Giants than the regular ones, having a belt and compression bandages around the wrist and a different hairstyle.

name: Super Barbarian
describtion: Superior in health, power, speed and most importantly, hair, the Super Barbarians are what regular Barbarians dream of becoming!

name: Ice Hound
describtion: Free from all the lava-induced indigestion, the Ice Hound is ready to freeze the flow of battle. Chill out, or else.

name: Super Minion
describtion: Super Minion's big forehead isn't just for show: sniping enemy defenses from a safe distance is simply a brainy move! Especially when you've grown too big to avoid Seeking Air Mines.

name: Unicorn
describtion: Unicorns have severe trust issues, but overcoming them with love and patience is totally worth it. They'll heal up any minor or major scrapes as well as any Healer!

name: Super Archer
describtion: Having achieved serious arm strength, the Super Archer can now threaten targets several buildings away.!
